JobTitle: Operations Manager - AC-130J Aircraft Modification - Site Lead
JobFullDesc: Description:Lockheed Martin is looking for a AC-130J Aircraft Modification Manager / Production Operations Site Lead to provide leadership for all work performed for a Modification Maintenance Team. This role will lead multiple L-coded and non-L-coded leaders within the Production Operations leadership team. This leader will be responsible for accomplishing aircraft modification, to include all aspects of modification, test and development. They will provide on-site leadership direction, strategic operations and serve as the single point of contact for all aircraft maintenance and support personnel to the Fixed Wing Operations Senior Manager. In this role, the leader will ensure a fully staffed, trained and skilled work force are on the job performing applicable tasks within budget and contractual schedules.  They will also be required to perform Cost Account Management (CAM) actions associated with all Modifications. On an as needed basis only, will interface with Program / Business Management on various actions to include reports, aircraft status updates, and budget metrics.  In addition to aircraft modification responsibilities, the candidate will be responsible for customer engagement, coordinating with facilities for the site and the overall health and appearance of the Crestview Site.  Crestview Site Lead also has oversight of the PMT’s assigned to the Crestview location and will be expected to provide support when needed to ensure their success.  This position reports directly to the Fixed Wing Operations Sr Manager and will periodically be assigned as his/her delegate.Basic Qualifications:- Aircraft / Task Scheduling experience- Microsoft Office Suite of Software (Word,   PowerPoint, Excel, and Project) experience- Excellent oral and written communications skills- Ten (10) years aircraft management experience- Knowledge of Earned Value Management (EVM)- Capable of working in a fast paced, demanding   environment, providing independent thinking,   problem resolution, and action with minimal   direct oversight by senior managementDesired Skills:- Basis of Estimate (BOE) and Proposal   experience - Experience with the Special Operations Forces   (SOF) customer environment. - Experience with C130 aircraft modification,   install and resource planning- Experience with, and ability to model Lockheed   Martin Full Spectrum Leadership competencies- Lean Six Sigma Green or Black Belt certification- Experience with Culture Optimization,   Performance Management Teams (PMTs), or   Culture of Accountability (CoA) programs- Experience working within a Collective   Bargaining Agreement environmentBASIC QUALIFICATIONS:job.QualificationsLockheed Martin is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer.
